cast.overview: New York Times reporters Megan Twohey and Jodi Kantor break one of the most important stories in a generation — a story that helped launch the #MeToo movement and shattered decades of silence around the subject of sexual assault in Hollywood.
cast.title: She Said

details.biography:
Wesley Holloway is a versatile actor whose career spans film, television, and stage. He is best known for his role as Young Gary in the dramatic comedy Meet Cute (2022), where he starred opposite Kaley Cuoco. Wesley gained further recognition for his standout performance in the independent cult hit Terrifier 2 (2022).

His recent film credits include As They Made Us (2022), She Said (2022), Junction (2024) and Stream (2024)

On stage, Wesley portrayed Young Leo in Tom Stoppard's critically acclaimed Broadway production of Leopoldstadt (winner of four Tony Awards, including Best Play). He also delivered a powerful performance as Young Orestes in Robert Icke's modern adaptation of Oresteia at the Park Avenue Armory.

With his compelling performances across mediums, Wesley Holloway continues to establish himself as a dynamic and promising talent in the entertainment industry.

IMDb  Bio By; yusufpiskin
details.name: Wesley Holloway
